name: chorally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves singing by a choir (= a group of people singing together): My job was to gather music for the show, chorally arrange it, and direct the rehearsals. The piece was chorally thrilling.
More examplesFewer examplesI have just sung chorally for the first time in years, having joined my local church choir.Overall it was a satisfying performance of the opera, both chorally and orchestrally. From the information given by the composer, we can assume that the song was performed chorally.
